scenes.background: Monica crosses her arms and looks at Bob.
scenes.description: Why dont we just vote on it and go with the majority?

options.text: Voting seems fair, but we should consider everyone's preferences too.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the fairness of voting but suggested considering everyone's preferences, showing good perception and empathy but moderate social skills and self-regulation.

options.text: Sure, voting is a democratic way to decide.
options.analysis: You agreed with the voting idea, showing good self-regulation and social skills, but empathy was lower.

options.text: Voting might not solve the issue if people feel strongly about their choices.
options.analysis: You pointed out a potential flaw in the voting system, showing good perception and motivation but lower social skills.
